ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Very slow after DirectX 9 patch
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Melanie Johnson  To:  Sent: Wednesday, March 31, 2004 9:32 AM Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Very
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: "Melanie Johnson" <melanie_6602@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 31, 2004 9:32 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Very slow after DirectX 9 patch


> I logged in for a second the other night and noticed
> that the characters look a little more "real" now, and
> the stars in the sky are a nice touch. But I wasn't
> able to do any real playing, just wandered around on
> an alt for a few minutes.
>
> After reading all this though, I'm not sure if I want
> to try and play, hehe. Maybe I'll wait a few more
> weeks... or months...
>
>
Yea the new graphics are great, the skys fabulous, but the probs continue.
Just today i fell through the earth but they added a new feature thats
supposed to detect that and drop you at a safe point in the zone. Dont know
what else they are adding as a "safety net" type moves, but at least they
are working on keeping us alive and moving till they get them fixed.
